documentation.title: Operator Spacing
documentation.standard: All binary and ternary (but not unary) operators MUST be preceded and followed by at least one space. This includes all arithmetic, comparison, assignment, bitwise, logical (excluding ! which is unary), string concatenation, type operators, trait operators (insteadof and as), and the single pipe operator (e.g. ExceptionType1 | ExceptionType2 $e).
